ingredients: 1 (15 oz) can diced tomatoes with green chiles
1 (8.5 oz) package dry corn muffin mix
instructions: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Heat oil in a Dutch oven over medium heat. Add chicken and cook until no longer pink inside, about 5 to 7 minutes. Add carrots, celery, bell pepper, and scallions, and cook until tender, about 5 minutes. Stir in tomatoes, black beans, chili powder, cumin, garlic, onion powder, paprika, salt, and black pepper. Cook until heated through, about 5 minutes more. In a bowl, combine cornbread mix with milk and egg. Remove Dutch oven from heat and spread cornbread batter on top of chicken mixture. Place Dutch oven in the preheated oven and bake until cornbread is golden, about 20 to 25 minutes.
